name: Sushi Mahjong Deluxe FREE
description:
*** SUSHI GIRLS MAHJONG - DELUXE EDITION ***

JOIN THE MILLIONS OF MAHJONG FANS IN THE WORLD!
Train your mind and become a Mahjong Master with the help of the legendary Sushi Girls in their latest Mahjong adventure.

STEP INTO THE RUMINANT WORLD OF SUSHI MAHJONG!
Use your mind and your power of deduction to solve Mahjong combinations created by the beautiful Sushi Girls.
The master of Sushi will teach and train you to become the biggest Sushi Master.
What are you waiting for ? Let's play !

Always remember, if you want to play Mahjong, play it Sushi-Style!
Come and visit the beautiful Chinese garden of the Sushi Girls.
Do you already know all Sushi Girls by name ?

FEATURES:
- Game Center Achievements
- 210 different layouts will train your mind
- Detailed Game statistics
- Find pairs, mix and undo function
- Free stones view and perspective switch
- Playfield zoom
- Awesome Chinese songs
- iPad and iPhone support
- Mahjong Shanghai
- Days of fun
- Manga Sushi style!
- Meet Akemi and the Sushi girls.


HISTORY:
One of the myths of the origin of Mahjong suggests that Confucius,the Chinese philosopher, developed the game in about 500 BC.
The three dragon tiles also agree with the three cardinal virtues bequeathed by Confucius.
The myth also claims that Confucius was fond of birds, which would explain the name Mahjong (maque = sparrow)!
